mapper.insert: INSERT INTO awards ( trainer_idx, awards_category, awards_name, awards_certificate, awards_approval, awards_idx ) VALUES ( #{trainer_idx}, #{awards_category}, #{awards_name}, #{awards_certificate}, #{awards_approval}, awards_seq.nextVal )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM AWARDS WHERE TRAINER_IDX = #{trainerIdx} AND AWARDS_APPROVAL = 'Y' ORDER BY AWARDS_IDX DESC

SELECT A.AWARDS_IDX, A.TRAINER_IDX, A.AWARDS_CATEGORY, A.AWARDS_NAME, A.AWARDS_CERTIFICATE, A.AWARDS_APPROVAL, M.MEMBER_IDX, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM AWARDS A LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_IDX = A.TRAINER_IDX ORDER BY AWARDS_IDX DESC
